abstract: Google’s founders plan to sell 10 million shares over five years, which would drop their voting rights in the company to 48 percent.
snippet: Google’s founders plan to sell 10 million shares over five years, which would drop their voting rights in the company to 48 percent.
lead_paragraph: Update | 1/23/10 12:19 a.m.  Correcting the amount of money that the founders would get if they follow through on the sales.

headline.main: Google Founders to Sell, But Are Not Losing Control
